sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import ChatInterface from './ChatInterface'; import '../styles/MainContent.scss'; const MainContent = ({ currentView, selectedProject, onBackToMain }) => { return (
{/* Project View */} {currentView === 'project' && selectedProject ? ( <> {/* Project Navigation */}

{selectedProject.name}

{/* Breadcrumb */}
Workspace 1 Projects {selectedProject.name}
{/* Project Chat Container */}

Absolutely, I'm ready to help craft a high-performing nurture email sequence for your campaign. To get started, I'll need to clarify a few details to ensure your emails are precisely tailored and impactful:

Key Info Needed

Ideal Customer Profile (ICP):

Who is your target audience for this sequence? (e.g., Industry, role/title, company size, pain points)

Journey Stages:

From which stage of the customer journey are you starting? (e.g., Problem-Aware, Solution-Aware)

To which stage do you want to guide them? (e.g., Product-Aware, Ready to Purchase)

Product/Service:

What product or service are you nurturing them toward? (A brief summary or product name will help.)

Special Offers or CTAs:

Any specific offers (e.g., free trial, demo, white paper) or CTAs you want to include?

Next Steps:

Once you provide these details (or upload the relevant Positioning Statement, ICP, etc.), I'll develop a creative brief for the sequence—with a recommended number of emails, core topics, and the main purpose of each message.

After you approve the brief, I'll draft the copy for each email in your brand voice, addressing ICP pain points, guiding them step by step, and including clear calls to action.

Let's Get Started!

Please provide the details above, or let me know if you'd like me to review any files you've uploaded for context.

{/* Project Chat Input */}
) : ( <> {/* Main View - Top Navigation */}
{/* Main View - Chat Container */}
)}
); }; export default MainContent;
